div.a: New Heights Academy Charter School logo

div.div: “ We are here to succeed in college and life ”

td.br: The New Heights Academy Charter School Board of Trustees will convene an online ZOOM meeting on April 23, 2020 at 7:00 pm. Please click above for details to join.

The New Heights Academy Charter School Lotter Will be held on Wednesday, April 22, 2020.
The Lottery will be held via ZOOM. This is a public meeting and all are invited to join.

td.a: Starting today, April 3, 2020 - Free Meals Available to ALL
td.br: Starting today, Friday, April 3, 2020, 3 free meals will be available for ALL New Yorkers in more than 400 Meal Hubs, Mon-Fri. Check for a site closest to you: http://schools.nyc.gov/freemeals. Stay safe and healthy!
The City of New York is providing assistance to New Yorkers during the COVID-19 crisis by delivering meals to those who cannot access food themselves. Register here

If you still need Internet access, please call Spectrum at 844-488-8395 or Optimum at 866-200-9522. Both vendors are providing fee service for 60 days. Please know that we are working hard to make sure every student has access to the New Heights Academy Distance Learning programs.
Check the schools website for new updates and resources. We wish you all well, stay safe and healthy.

img.alt: Ms. Skufka, Ms. Egan, Ms. Rosario, and Mr. Obaner in the spotlight

a.h3: Ms. Skufka, Ms. Egan, Ms. Rosario, and Mr. Obaner

div.p:
The mission of New Heights Academy Charter School is to
graduate students who are prepared to succeed in college and life.

a.br:
I am Driven.
I do not Quit.

I am Accountable.
I do My Best Work.

I Act and Speak Honestly.
I am My Best Self.

I Work Hard & Exercise Self-control.
I offer no Excuses.

I am Passionate about Learning.
I can Get Smarter.
